content.rendered:
Directed by Ashok Nanda.

Written by Alaukik Rahi.

Cast Anupam Kher(Justice Omprakash Tyagi). Kumud Mishra(Insp. Satyanarayan Sharma). Esha Gupta(DCP Laxmi Rathi). Zakir Hussain(MP Giriraj Rawat). Rajesh Sharma(Pankaj Singh). Murali Sharma(Dr. Ajay Chopra (as Murli Sharma)). Deepshikha Nagpal(Dr. Reena Chopra). Mohaq Kansara(Abdul Shaikh (as Hitesh Kansara)). Zarina Wahab(Parveen Bibi – Abdul’s Mom). Kashyap Barbhaya(Shamim). Anusmriti Sarkar(Shagufta). Nilofar Gesawat(Shalini Tyagi). Parikshit Sahni(Colonel Sahab). Ehsan Khan(SP Sanjeev Verma). Saurabh Pachauri(Mukul Chopra). Sashreek Mishra(Rohit – Tyagi’s Son-in-law). Jayaka Yagnik(Pooja – Tyagi’s Daughter). Akram Ali Khan(Rahul Tyagi). Poonam Rane(Rekha Tyagi). Irfan Razaa Khan(SI Vijay Prabhu). Sameer Pandey(SI Sameer Pandey). Manoj Mishra(Dilawar – Rawat’s Henchman). Jeeban Panda(Parvez – Shagufta’s Father). Nasir Khan(Advocate Rai). Anant Mahadevan(Advocate Joshi). Ajay Tiwari(Munna – Male Nurse). Alok Pandey(Afzal Khurshid – Mechanic). Saavi Chauhan(Sonia – Dilawar’s Girlfriend). Shabd Jain(Shabd – Tyagi’s Grandson). Riddhi Ashok Thakur(Bebo – Tyagi’s Granddaughter). Rajkumar Kanojia(Policeman Hrithik). Saurabh Nayyar(Policeman Roshan). Rinku Bharti(Female Cop). Hema Sharma(Special Appearance – in Wedding Song). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Kamlesh Singh Kushwaha. Ketan Patel. Swati Singh. Sanjeev Verma.

Production Cinema Friday International. Dneev Film. Netrix Entertainment.
